creator: S-Labs sp. z o.o.
descriptionHtml:
Appartme app allows user to connect with IoT devices in appartment and:
* manage heating
* control electrical sockets
* optimize energy consumption
* control temperature
* control water valves
* share your devices with home members
* and many more

Simple and fully customizable dashboards makes Appartme app highly user friendly.
descriptionShort: Take control over your apartment with Appartme

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Bug fixes.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Monitor your heat and water consumption in the app with your Ista Connect account. Compare past data to optimize the use of utilities in your home.
Create automations based on humidity, temperature, degree of opening and many other factors.

title: Appartme

creator: S-Labs sp. z o.o.

* optimize energy consumption

* and many more

Simple and fully customizable dashboards makes Appartme app highly user friendly.
descriptionShort: Take control over your apartment with Appartme

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
You no longer need to create an Appartme account to log into the application. We have added the ability to log in with a Google account.
Owners of Main Modules and flood sensors can protect their apartment even more. Go to the Main Module settings and configure Smart Rules so that the water valve closes automatically when flooding is detected!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We have added new functions of the thermostatic head. Now you can control the it from the new view, switch operating modes and block the temperature control from the application. We have also corrected several errors in the process of adding devices
